title: Amazon shakes up AI team as veteran Rohit Prasad leaves, Peter DeSantis promoted
description: Amazon is shaking up its artificial intelligence team with one long-time veteran heading for the exit and another taking over a more expansive group
content:
Amazon is shaking up its artificial intelligence team with one long-time veteran heading for the exit and another taking over a more expansive group that includes AI models, custom silicon and quantum computing.

title: Japan's Nikkei ends at 3-week low on tech selloff over AI-business outlook
description: Japan's Nikkei share average ended at a three-week low on Thursday, pressured by heavyweight tech stocks as investors weighed the outlook for artificial intelligence and data centre businesses.
content:
Japan's Nikkei share average ended at a three-week low on Thursday, pressured by heavyweight tech stocks as investors weighed the outlook for artificial intelligence and data centre businesses.

title: AI Disruption: The Pervasive Influence Over Journalism
description: The rise of Artificial Intelligence is reshaping industries, particularly journalism. AI-generated content poses challenges in verification, threatening journalism's role in society. The media must adapt with new standards and practices to mitigate AI's impact and preserve trust in information sources.
content: In an era defined by the rapid advancement of Artificial Intelligence (AI), industries worldwide are grappling with profound disruptions, and journalism is no exception. Today, companies dealing in AI tools rank among the most valuable corporations, ... [814 chars]

description: OpenAI and Anthropic are looking to expand their office footprints in Dublin, a move that underscores both firms’ growing presence in Europe and the race to boost global uptake of their artificial intelligence services.

title: Who is Rohit Prasad? Amazon CEO Andy Jassy announces departure of AI exec after 12-years
description: For the past two years, Rohit Prasad led the creation of Amazon Nova and Amazon's artificial generative intelligence (AGI) unit organisation.
content:
Rohit Prasad, the Indian-origin Amazon AI chief, is set to leave the company after a 12-year stint. Sharing the news, CEO Andy Jassy said, “Rohit Prasad…has decided to leave Amazon at the end of this year.”

title: AI adoption in MSMEs can unlock over USD 500 bn economic value: BCGX-FICCI report
description: NEW DELHI, Dec 18:  Adoption of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in India’s 64 million Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) alone could unlock over USD 500 billion in economic value, but the country must pivot from an “adopt-first” to an “invent-first” mindset to realise this potential, according to a new report.   The report, titled “India’s Triple AI Imperative: Succeeding with AI in India”, released by Boston Consulting Group (BCGX) and Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce & Industry (FICCI), noted […]
content:
